name: Drowning City
description:
In this game, you collect garbage in a submerged city. With its dark atmosphere and uncanny environments, the game is a really relaxed experience. You can finish the game in matter of minutes, but you can always take your time.

Controls:

WASD, Left Stick - Move

Mouse, Right Stick - Look

Space, B - Jump

E, A - Collect garbage

Game made by Duke
